definition: classics/sacred book/scripture/to pass through/to undergo/to bear/to endure/warp (textile)/longitude/menstruation/channel (TCM)/abbr. for economics 經濟|经济[jing1 ji4]
to build up an enterprise through painstaking efforts

pinyin: bo1 re3 bo1 luo2 mi4 duo1 xin1 jing1

sentences.english: At the end, he ground out the enormous "Biography of George Washington".
sentences.chinese: 最後，他苦心經營總算寫成卷帙浩繁的《華盛頓傳》。

sentences.english: The result verified the meridian distribution of Borneol in TCM theory.
sentences.chinese: 結果證實了中醫中冰片歸心經的論述。

sentences.english: I share the Heart Sutra with you.
The Vietnamese monk, Thich Nhat Hanh has a very good commentary on the Heart Sutra.
sentences.chinese: 越南的一行禪師，著有一本《心經》的很好的註釋。

sentences.english: So says the Heart Sutra, but what do these lines really say?
sentences.chinese: 這是心經裏的句子，但是這些話說的是什麼呢？

sentences.english: The garment store they so painstakingly built up also ended in failure.
sentences.chinese: 他們苦心經營的服裝商店也以失敗而告終。

definition: Amitabha Buddha/the Buddha of the Western paradise/may the lord Buddha preserve us!/merciful Buddha!
gate to enlightment (Buddhism)/Buddhism/way/method/(old) south gate of a palace
(Buddhism) to be moved at the sight of good deeds/to join in charitable deeds/to tour temples
